status.needHelp: Need help? Contact our support team

granted.title: Notifications Enabled!
granted.description: You will now receive push notifications from Ring Platform. You can manage your notification preferences anytime.

denied.title: Notifications Blocked
denied.description: Push notifications have been blocked for this site. To enable them, please check your browser settings or click the permission icon in your address bar.

pending.title: Permission Required
pending.description: Please allow notifications to receive important updates and messages from Ring Platform.

unsupported.title: Notifications Not Supported
unsupported.description: Your browser or device doesn't support push notifications. Please use a modern browser for the best experience.
unsupported.browserInfo: Supported browsers include Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge on desktop and mobile.

subscribed.title: Successfully Subscribed!
subscribed.description: You are now subscribed to notifications and will receive relevant updates.
subscribed.activeSubscription: Your subscription is active and notifications are enabled.

unsubscribed.title: Subscription Cancelled
unsubscribed.description: You have been unsubscribed from notifications. You can resubscribe anytime if you change your mind.

failed.title: Subscription Failed
failed.description: We couldn't subscribe you to notifications due to a technical issue. Please try again or contact support.

pending.title: Subscription Processing
pending.description: Your subscription request is being processed. This should complete shortly.

sent.title: Notification Sent
sent.description: Your notification has been successfully sent to all subscribers.

delivered.title: Notification Delivered!
delivered.description: Your notification has been delivered to the recipient's device.
delivered.deliveryConfirmed: Delivery confirmed by the notification service.

failed.title: Send Failed
failed.description: We couldn't send your notification due to a technical issue. Please try again.

pending.title: Sending Notification
pending.description: Your notification is being sent. This may take a few moments.

delivered.title: Message Delivered
delivered.description: Your message has been successfully delivered to the recipient.
delivered.deliveryConfirmed: The message was delivered to the recipient's device.

read.title: Message Read
read.description: Your message has been read by the recipient.

failed.title: Delivery Failed
failed.description: Your message couldn't be delivered. This may be due to device settings or connectivity issues.

cancelled.title: Delivery Cancelled
cancelled.description: Message delivery was cancelled before reaching the recipient.
